CustomField.formula: CASE(Frequency__c, 'One-Time', 0, 'Daily', 1, '6X Per Week', 2, '5X Per Week', 3, '4X Per Week', 4, '3X Per Week', 5, '2X Per Week', 6, 'Weekly', 7, 'Fixed Weekly', 7, '14 Days', 14, 'Twice Monthly', 15, '28 Days', 28, 'Monthly', 30, '42 Days', 42, '56 Days', 56, 'Bi-Monthly', 60, '84 Days', 84, 'Quarterly', 90, '112 Days', 112, '120 Days', 120, '168 Days', 168, 'Semi-Annually', 182, '2X Per Year', 182, '182 Days', 182, 'Annually', 365, 0 )
CustomField.label: FrequencyInDays
